info.title: API StarWars extendida
info.description: Listado de la URI's de la API Naves

post.summary:
Set an inventory quantity of a specific starship. 
A Starship resource is a single transport craft that has hyperdrive capability.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific starship

current_quantity.description: Current quantity that was just set

updated_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

created_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

id.description: intern id that represents an unique register

detail.description: Not matches results for id request param

message.description: Message that explain the error in request

post.summary:
Set an inventory quantity of a specific vehicle. 
A Vehicle resource is a single transport craft that does not have hyperdrive capability.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific vehicle

current_quantity.description: Current quantity that was just set

updated_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

created_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

id.description: intern id that represents an unique register

detail.description: Not matches results for id request param

message.description: Message that explain the error in request

post.summary:
Add a quantity of a specific vehicle. 
A Vehicle resource is a single transport craft that does not have hyperdrive capability.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific vehicle

current_quantity.description: Current quantity that was just set

updated_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

created_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

id.description: intern id that represents an unique register

detail.description: Not matches results for id request param

message.description: Message that explain the error in request

post.summary:
Add a quantity of a specific Starship. 
A Starship resource is a single transport craft that has hyperdrive capability.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific vehicle

current_quantity.description: Current quantity that was just set

updated_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

created_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

id.description: intern id that represents an unique register

detail.description: Not matches results for id request param

message.description: Message that explain the error in request

post.summary:
Subtract a quantity of a specific vehicle. 
A Vehicle resource is a single transport craft that does not have hyperdrive capability.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific vehicle

current_quantity.description: Current quantity that was just set

updated_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

created_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

id.description: intern id that represents an unique register

detail.description: Not matches results for id request param

message.description: Message that explain the error in request

error.example: Operation not allowed: negative stock result

post.summary:
Subtract a quantity of a specific Starship. 
A Starship resource is a single transport craft that has hyperdrive capability.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific vehicle

current_quantity.description: Current quantity that was just set

updated_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

created_at.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

id.description: intern id that represents an unique register

detail.description: Not matches results for id request param

message.description: Message that explain the error in request

error.example: Operation not allowed: negative stock result

get.summary: Returns the Vehicles with the added 'count' property. Returns them in a paginated manner.
get.description: A Vehicle resource is a single transport craft that does not have hyperdrive capability.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of page for results in pagination

name.description: The name of this vehicle. The common name, such as Sand Crawler or Speeder bike

model.description: The model or official name of this vehicle. Such as All-Terrain Attack Transport

vehicle_class.description: The class of this vehicle, such as Wheeled or Repulsorcraft

manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of this vehicle. Comma separated if more than one

length.description: The length of this vehicle in meters

cost_in_credits.description: The cost of this vehicle new, in Galactic Credits

crew.description: The number of personnel needed to run or pilot this vehicle

passengers.description: The number of non-essential people this vehicle can transport

max_atmosphering_speed.description: The maximum speed of this vehicle in the atmosphere

cargo_capacity.description: The maximum number of kilograms that this vehicle can transport

consumables.description: The maximum length of time that this vehicle can provide consumables for its entire crew without having to resupply

films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in

pilots.description: An array of People URL Resources that this vehicle has been piloted by

url.description: the hypermedia URL of this resource

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

detail.description: Not matches results for request params

get.summary: Returns the Starships with the added 'count' property. Returns them in a paginated manner.
get.description: A Starship resource is a single transport craft that has hyperdrive capability.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of page for results in pagination

name.description: The name of this starship. The common name, such as Death Star

model.description: The model or official name of this starship. Such as T-65 X-wing or DS-1 Orbital Battle Station

starship_class.description: The class of this starship, such as Starfighter or Deep Space Mobile Battlestation

manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of this starship. Comma separated if more than one

cost_in_credits.description: The cost of this starship new, in galactic credits

length.description: The length of this starship in meters

crew.description: The number of personnel needed to run or pilot this starship

passengers.description: The number of non-essential people this starship can transport

max_atmosphering_speed.description: The maximum speed of this starship in the atmosphere. N/A if this starship is incapable of atmospheric flight

hyperdrive_rating.description: The class of this starships hyperdrive

MGLT.description: The Maximum number of Megalights this starship can travel in a standard hour. A Megalight is a standard unit of distance and has never been defined before within the Star Wars universe. This figure is only really useful for measuring the difference in speed of starships. We can assume it is similar to AU, the distance between our Sun (Sol) and Earth

cargo_capacity.description: The maximum number of kilograms that this starship can transport

consumables.description: The maximum length of time that this starship can provide consumables for its entire crew without having to resupply

films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in

pilots.description: An array of People URL Resources that this vehicle has been piloted by

url.description: the hypermedia URL of this resource

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

detail.description: Not matches results for request params

get.summary: Returns a specific Vehicle using his ID, with the added 'count' property.
get.description: A Vehicle resource is a single transport craft that does not have hyperdrive capability.

cost_in_credits.description: The cost of this vehicle new, in Galactic Credits

crew.description: The number of personnel needed to run or pilot this vehicle

passengers.description: The number of non-essential people this vehicle can transport

max_atmosphering_speed.description: The maximum speed of this vehicle in the atmosphere

cargo_capacity.description: The maximum number of kilograms that this vehicle can transport

consumables.description: The maximum length of time that this vehicle can provide consumables for its entire crew without having to resupply

films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in

pilots.description: An array of People URL Resources that this vehicle has been piloted by

url.description: the hypermedia URL of this resource

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited

get.summary: Returns a count of specific Vehicle using his ID or name or model.
get.description: A Vehicle resource is a single transport craft that does not have hyperdrive capability.

model.description: The model or official name of this vehicle.

url.description: the hypermedia URL of this resource

get.summary: Returns a count of specific Starship using his ID or name or model.
get.description: A Starship resource is a single transport craft that has hyperdrive capability.

name.description: The name of this starship. The common name, such as Death Star

model.description: The model or official name of this starship. Such as T-65 X-wing or DS-1 Orbital Battle Station
